message.content:
I'll identify the net cash flow from operating activities and its component sub-items.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that the "Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities" is clearly listed with a value of -6856840.58 for the date 2024-02-01.

The 7 sub-items that make up this value are:
1. Net Profit: -2035736.52
2. Depreciation: 100239.89
3. (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable: -3098023.69
4. (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable: -5155.34
5. (Increase) Decrease in Inventory: -3420000.00
6. Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable: 1260000.00
7. Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable: 341835.08

These values indeed sum up to -6856840.58, which confirms they are the correct components.
